p: Retrospective observational study including 40 patients with cardiogenic shock admitted to our cardiac ICU were enrolled between January 2013 and March 2015. Arterial and mixed-venousblood gases and hemodynamic variables were obtained at admission and every 2 hours for intial 6 hours. dPCO2, Ca-CvO2, dPCO2/Ca-CvO2 and Cv-aCO2/Da-vO2 quotients was calculated.
